data.comment: The first-half is under way at Arsenal Stadium - Dinamo Moscow kick-off to start the match.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow are coming forward and Daniil Fomin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
In the minute 5, Arsenal Tula's Kings Kangwa misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at Arsenal Stadium.
Dinamo Moscow needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 8, Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal Tula in Tula.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Arsenal Stadium.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 10, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
In the minute 13, Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Nikolay Komlichenko of Dinamo Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Can Arsenal Tula capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Dinamo Moscow's Clinton N'Jie is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
Dinamo Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
In Tula, Nikolay Komlichenko (Dinamo Moscow) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tula.
Daniil Lesovoy is on target to give Arsenal Tula a 1-0 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Yevgeni Lutsenko.
In the minute 25, Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 26, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vladimir Moskalev awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 27, Vladimir Moskalev signals a Dinamo Moscow throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
Dinamo Moscow's Daniil Fomin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Dinamo Moscow territory.
In the minute 32, Arsenal Tula's Kirill Kombarov gets in a shot on goal at Arsenal Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for Arsenal Tula, close to Dinamo Moscow's area.
Daniil Lesovoy for Arsenal Tula gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 33, It's a goal kick for the away team in Tula.
Can Arsenal Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dinamo Moscow's half?
In the minute 35, Dinamo Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Daniil Fomin (Dinamo Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Dinamo Moscow.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goran Causic (Arsenal Tula) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 39, Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vladimir Moskalev blows against Dinamo Moscow's Clinton N'Jie for offside.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 43, Vladimir Moskalev awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dinamo Moscow's half?
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Dinamo Moscowâ€™s Clinton N'Jie is on his feet again at Arsenal Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Kirill Novikov (Dinamo Moscow) is making a first substitution, with Vladislav Karapuzov replacing Sebastian Szymanski.
The away team replace Clinton N'Jie with Sylvester Igboun.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Clinton N'Jie.
In the minute 46, Arsenal Tula kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Ball safe as Dinamo Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
Yuri Kovalev is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 49, Sylvester Igboun gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dinamo Moscow.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow close to the penalty box.
Valeri Gromyko is replacing Kirill Kombarov for Arsenal Tula at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 51, Daniil Khlusevich (Arsenal Tula) has replaced the possibly injured Yuri Kovalev.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a throw-in for Dinamo Moscow, close to Arsenal Tula's area.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Tula to check on Evans Kangwa, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 55, In Tula Arsenal Tula attack through Evans Kangwa. The finish is off target, however.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Arsenal Tula's Evans Kangwa is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 55, Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In Tula a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Dinamo Moscow.
In the minute 57, Dinamo Moscow needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
Dinamo Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Robert Bauer is booked for the home team.
In the minute 58, Kirill Novikov is making the team's third substitution at Arsenal Stadium with Nikola Moro replacing Daniil Fomin.
Dinamo Moscow have a goal kick.
Valeri Gromyko is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 62, Valeri Gromyko is back on his feet again.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valeri Gromyko (Arsenal Tula) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 63, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Maximilian Philipp for Dinamo Moscow who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Maximilian Philipp is back on the pitch.
Dinamo Moscow to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In the minute 64, Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Dinamo Moscow.
Evans Kangwa for Arsenal Tula has been booked by Vladimir Moskalev and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 66, Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Tula Dinamo Moscow's Maximilian Philipp is caught offside.
In the minute 69, Dinamo Moscow are whistled for offside.
Arsenal Tula drives forward and Daniil Lesovoy gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula have been given a penalty at Arsenal Stadium...
Goal! Daniil Lesovoy extends Arsenal Tula's lead from the spot. They now lead 2-0.
In the minute 75, Dinamo Moscow drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Vyacheslav Grulev is on a sub for Nikolay Komlichenko for Dinamo Moscow.
Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 77, Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Vladimir Moskalev.
Daniil Lesovoy of Arsenal Tula gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Dinamo Moscow at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Dinamo Moscow at Arsenal Stadium.
At Arsenal Stadium, Roman Evgeniev has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Anton Terekhov is replacing Maximilian Philipp for the away team.
In the minute 81, Kings Kangwa of Arsenal Tula gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Dinamo Moscow goal kick.
Dinamo Moscow's Vyacheslav Grulev is whistled for offside at Arsenal Stadium.
In the minute 83, Artur Nigmatullin is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Dinamo Moscow's Vyacheslav Grulev has been booked in Tula.
Artur Nigmatullin (Arsenal Tula) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Egor Shamov.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Goran Causic with Georgi Kostadinov. This is the fourth substitution made today by Sergey Podpaliy.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
Vladimir Moskalev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula just outside Dinamo Moscow's area.
In the minute 88, Arsenal Tula's Daniil Lesovoy breaks free at Arsenal Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Vladimir Moskalev awards Dinamo Moscow a goal kick.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, Vladimir Moskalev awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Dinamo Moscow.
At Arsenal Stadium the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In Tula a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The match has come to a close in Tula. The final score is 2-0.
The match at Arsenal Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Evans Kangwa, who is down injured.
It seems as if Evans Kangwa is unable to continue. Guram Adzhoev replaces him for the home team.
